item.title: üéÆGames I LikeüéÆ
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
These are the games I've spent the most time playing.

My All-Time Favorites

Spelunky HD

I grew up playing this on my Xbox 360 so it's definitely one of my top games.

Minecraft

I have a special love for the Xbox 360 Edition of the game, but I also love playing the Java Edition.

Left 4 Dead 2

One of my favorites, I love everything the soundtrack, the characters, and the voice acting.

item.title: üëã Welcome
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Welcome

Thanks for visiting my website.

What You'll Find Here

This blog is a collection of my interests:

  • Tech: I write about my journey with programming, cybersecurity, and my experiences using Linux.
  • Personal: I'm a big fan of anime and video games. I'll share my thoughts on shows I'm watching or games I'm playing or just post a general life update.
  • Random: Occasionally, I'll post about other things I find interesting, or I'll just go on a rant here.

item.title: üíªPrograms I useüíª
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Here are some of my favorite and most-used programs.

QBitTorrent

A fast, lightweight, and ad-free BitTorrent client that works everywhere.

Neovim

My go-to text editor, I use it on basically everything.

Lobster

A simple and effective command-line tool for watching movies and tv series directly in your terminal. It's a great complement to ani-cli for everything that isn't anime.

Ani-cli

An essential script for any anime fan who likes the terminal. It lets you find, watch, and download your favorite shows with a few simple commands. It's fast, efficient, and makes watching anime incredibly convenient.

item.title: ‚ù§Ô∏èThings I like‚ù§Ô∏è
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Here are some of the things i enjoy.

Programming

I started coding because i love problem-solving along with making my own stuff. I mainly work on CLI's alongside websites/APIs

Cybersecurity

I love Cybersecurity and its what i want to go to college for as im currently in high school right now i first started programming because i found out about Cybersecurity

Linux

I use linux as my main Operating System I love how customizable it is and the freedom it gives you compared to windows

Anime

My all-time favorites are:

Gurren Lagann

Angel Beats!
